[Title]: King Kong
[Year]: 2005
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Runtime]: 187 Min
[Director]: Peter Jackson
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Actors]:
Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Colin Hanks, Andy Serkis, Evan Parke, Jamie Bell, Lobo Chan,
John Sumner, Craig Hall, Kyle Chandler, William Johnson, Mark Hadlow, Geraldine Brophy
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Plot Summary]:
A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more
than just cannibalistic natives.
